<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataKN extends data { const CODE = 'KN'; const PREFIX = 1; const REGION = 'North America'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[58]\d\d|900)\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '869(?:2(?:29|36)|302|4(?:6[015-9]|70))\d{4}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '869(?:5(?:5[6-8]|6[5-7])|66\d|76[02-7])\d{4}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '8(?:00|33|44|55|66|77|88)[2-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '900[2-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '5(?:00|2[12]|33|44|66|77|88)[2-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'personal_number', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2-$3', ); }
